name: Soul Searching
description: Your soul has been captured by an evil necromancer determined to take over the lands! Can you escape his perilous dungeon home to warn the kingdom before the undead rise again? Solve various puzzles through each floor of the necromancer's dungeon to ascend through the necromancer's home back to the surface.  But you are not alone in the dungeon's chambers, as his undead minions and fellow lost souls also occupy the many floors. Sneak past his servants and rescue your fellow spirit to save the kingdom before it's too late!
